page.title: 04BRANT BROUGHTON SCHOOL GAMES
page.content: Several tig games are played. When people are tug they have to stand still until a person who is free tigs them.For Stuck in The Mud people who are caught stand with their legs apart and arms outstretched.People being chased are safe if they are under the caught person's arms or legs. They free the caught person when they pass right through or under.Other versions are Tiggy off ground and off tarmac. Cinderella is a skipping game. Two people turn the rope and one person jumps over the rope in the middle.They all then sing this rhyme:{"Cinderella {dressed in red, went upstairs to go to {bed,kissed the snake, instead of Jake, {how many doctors did it take?"}The rope holders then turn the rope quickly and count until the person in the middle stops the rope.A variation of this game is called Bumper Car.
